overview:
Victor Young is the CEO and Co-Founder of Flinja: an exclusive college centric marketplace where students, staff, and alumni can hire and be hired. In this role, he is responsible for setting and executing the company’s strategy of tying the nation’s college campuses together though jobs.

Prior to Flinja, Victor was the CEO and Founder of Enet, a SAAS/ASP company specializing in eApplications, quotation systems, and CRM tools for Fortune 100 Insurance companies. He helped expand Enet into an online brokerage and grew Enet from 5 employees to over 500 employees and contractors. Enet is the nation’s largest virtual online insurance CRM and brokerage.

Victor specializes in guiding early-stage startups into successful businesses. He assists in product advice and provides valuable feedback to entrepreneurs. As a part-time angel investor, he provides critical investment capital to seed ideas and watch them blossom. He works on crafting innovative business models.

Victor Young received his B.A. from the University of Waterloo.
